body_html: Most users install CUDA using the .sh run scripts NVIDIA provides. I assume you used a different installation method. We can't support every permutation of install methods for NVIDIA drivers, so we have chosen the way most people tend to do it, because usually people directly download from NVIDIA to get the most up to date driver. Hopefully doing such will solve your problem without the need to symlink.
